forecast.day_comments: Snow likely, mainly before 1am. The snow could be heavy at times.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. Windy, with a southwest wind 30 to 35 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 10 to 14 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A slight chance of snow before 7am, then a chance of snow after 10am.  Mostly sunny, with a high near 22. Breezy, with a southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
